column1: Little Goat Diner////I visited this diner with a group of five and we had the best time! We went on a Sunday morning and because of it's location in the west loop
column2: it was slammed. The staff was able to get our group in 20 minutes earlier than originally expected. We were seated on the patio
column3: which has really cute wooden tables and eclectic decor. The atmosphere was great. We were greeted by a really nice and energetic waiter who helped us with our menu selections - they have A TON of delicious choices to choose from. All five in our group chose different orders so that we could try each other's selections. I left thinking there must not be a wrong choice on their menu. My favorite was my order (of course) which was the machos nachos. My only regret is that I wasn't able to try any of their lunch selections. We will be sure to return.
